features: Ferrari Race Car Set - Features a LEGO toy car model of the 1970 Ferrari 512 M, a Ferrari racing driver minifigure complete with a race suit, wig, and crash helmet.
Authentic Details - Packed with room for a driver minifigure and lots of authentic detailing, showcasing the car's stunning aerodynamic design.
Masterful Building Experience - Explore the car’s aerodynamic design as you recreate it piece by piece and put your masterwork on display to admire.
LEGO Building App - Zoom, rotate, and view models from all angles as you build with the LEGO Building Instructions app, available for smartphones and tablets.
Speed Champions Fun - LEGO Speed Champions building sets give kids and adults the chance to explore some of the world's most iconic cars, including this Ferrari race car model.
Perfect Gift Idea - This Ferrari race car toy model is an ideal birthday or any occasion gift for grandchildren, boys and girls who love toy sports cars and LEGO building kits.
body.description: The LEGO Speed Champions 1970 Ferrari 512 M (76906) toy sports car model for kids gives them or any car enthusiasts of all ages the chance to collect, build and explore an iconic race car with the included Ferrari racing driver minifigure. Perfect for play and display, this replica LEGO race car toy captures the essence of the legendary 1970’s endurance original – famed for its fearsome performance and epic on-track races. This collectable Ferrari toy race car includes printed and interactive digital building instructions. Available in the free LEGO Building Instructions app for smartphones and tablets, the intuitive digital guide comes with amazing zoom and rotate tools that allow you to visualize a model from all angles as you build. LEGO Speed Champions building sets deliver mini versions of the world’s leading and best-known cars. Popular with kids and adults alike, the high-quality models are great for display or for thrilling race action against other cars from the Speed Champions range. The Ferrari car toy for kids makes a great gift for grandchildren and measures over 1.5 in. (4cm) high, 6.5 in. (15cm) long and 2.5 in. (7cm) wide. Contains 291 pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A treat for fans of celebrated race cars Detailed LEGO replica of the ferociously fast 1970 Ferrari 512 M.
Collect, build, display and play! This mini version of the 1970 Ferrari 512 M is perfect for display and exciting race action.

LEGO Speed Champions 1970 Ferrari 512 M Just like the real thing! Realistic details capture the look of the iconic race car. Aerodynamic design Kids recreate the car’s sleek lines, brick by brick. Realistic race action Pop the Ferrari driver behind the wheel for epic racing fun!
A rewarding build for ages 8 and up Includes printed and digital guides for an enjoyable building experience, helping kids develop skills that last a lifetime.
More vehicles to collect and combine Combine the 1970 Ferrari 512 M with other vehicles from the LEGO Speed Champions range (each set sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Lego Build
reviews.reviewText: The lego build was fun to make, it looks great after completing the car. The only complaint I have is the stickers. I am a perfectionist and try to get the perfect alignment of the stickers was annoying and a bit difficult to do for the smaller lego parts that needed a sticker. Overall I had fun and it looked great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lego set is for older kids or adults and the race car is very nice and durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved by my son
reviews.reviewText: This product was loved by my 8 year old son. The stickers make it look more realistic. Not too easy not too hard. Completed in 1 day. Plan on ordering more sets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific educational toy
reviews.reviewText: Lego kits are so good for teaching kids to follow instructions as well as develop their own creativity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A happy grandson!
reviews.reviewText: This set was a gift for a grandson and he has not assembled the car yet, so I cannot speak to how easy it was (will be) for him. However, he is really excited to be building Lego kits so I'm sure he will enjoy it. Great kit for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fun Lego car for all ages
reviews.reviewText: Lego Ferrari, so much fun, also had a Lamborghini Countach Lego kit, my daughter and I had so much fun putting kits together. Nice Lego set. Amazon driver dropped package in rain, only had to go two more steps to get to dry area, but holiday time, they are probably tired of delivering… plastic legos fine in plastic, box wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice gift to give to a kid that likes to build things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was Christmas for my son. I told him I would get him a car for his midlife crisis.
This looks way better in person when built!Great gift!
Muito bom, ideal para montar pai e filho.

Llegó un día antes del previsto, aunque la caja llegó un poco maltratada, es una buena opción para regalar, no trae muchas piezas y es fácil de armar, para coleccionismo no lo recomiendo tanto, es más para niños.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little project to do with your kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter for Christmas and really enjoyed spending the time building it together. She liked finding all the pieces we needed and the steps were easy enough for her to follow. The instructions are pretty clear and as long as you are looking carefully at the details, the build goes very smoothly. My daughter also liked how the instruction booklet has a little line on the bottom of each page tracking how far you are progressing with each step. It took us a couple hours to build but we were taking our time and enjoying the process. It has also sparked an interest in cars for her which I love! The only downside was that sometimes the pieces you adding on don't have the most stable base so as you push down on one piece, something else easily pops off. Overall, a great little project and time spent together. Would highly recommend!
